title: Malnutrition
summary: Malnutrition is defined as a physical state that results from the lack of intake of nutrition, causing changes in body composition and body cell mass.[12] It adversely affects the physical and mental functional status of the affected person.[13] A diet that does not supply a healthy amount of one or more nutrients including protein, carbohydrates, fat, vitamins or minerals causes malnutrition.[14][1][3][15][1]
